mapper.select: SELECT contractno, lender, borrower, `type`, goods, startdate, duedate, picture, record, description, agreed, status FROM contract c, `user` u WHERE u.userno = #{userno} AND (c.lender = u.id OR c.borrower = u.id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract (lender, borrower, `type`, goods, startdate,duedate, picture, record, description, agreed, status) VALUES (#{lender}, #{borrower}, #{type}, #{goods}, #{startdate}, #{duedate}, #{picture}, #{record}, #{description}, #{agreed}, {status})
